DOC.brief_summary: Sleev gastrectomy is a procedure performed for permanent treatment of obesity. For the procedure, cutting of the stomach is performed with differents long of stapplers. The aim of the study is to determine wich long of stappler is applicable in any stage of the procedure ans the variation expected.
DOC.brief_title: Standarization for Stappler Application During Sleeve Gastrectomy
DOC.detailed_description: After permormed laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy the stonach retrieved for pathology study will be messured in three ponts: antrum, body and fundus. In each point medition of the two walls and any wall (anterior and posterior) will be messurd. Those data will be stariscally analized to perform a applicable guidelines for stapller selection.
DOC.criteria: every laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy between 18 y.o. and 70 y.o. no previous gastric operation under 18 y.o. or over 70 y.o. previous gastric surgery
